parameters.description: Provide location type to query on. Possible values : country, state, city

parameters.description: Field is optional when location_type is country. If querying for state, provide id of country. If querying for city, provide id of state.

divide_by.description: Divide by value for the quantity transformation

round.description: Rounding method for the quantity transformation

verified.description: Indicates domain is verified or not. TXT and A records should propagate correctly.

is_primary.description: Indicates domain is primary or not. Primary domain is the default/main domain.

is_shortlink.description: Shortlink is present or not for the domain

_id.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of the domain

is_predefined.description: Domain is hosting domain or not

enabled.description: Shows whether sales channel website URL is enabled or not

basepath.description: Base path for the current sales channel website

items.description: List of all the domains added to the sales channel

enabled.description: Shows sales channel auth is enabled or not enabled.

redirect_from.description: Old domain URL of the sales channel

redirect_to.description: New domain URL of the sales channel. Users will be automatically redirected from old domain to new domain.

type.description: It shows domain redirection type. Permanent redirection is for long time period redirection, and temporary redirection for a short time period.

name.description: Indicates the name of application meta

value.description: Value related to application meta name

description.description: It contains detailed information about the sales channel

channel_type.description: It indicates different channel types like store, website-and-mobile-apps. Default value is store.

cache_ttl.description: An integer value that specifies the number of seconds until the key expires

is_internal.description: Indicates whether a sales channel is internal or not

is_active.description: Indicates whether a sales channel is active or not active

_id.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of the sales channel

name.description: Name of the sales channel, e.g. Zenz Fashion

owner.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of owner who owns the application

company_id.description: Numeric ID allotted to a business account where the sales channel exists

token.description: Randomly generated fixed-length string for sales channel. It is required and auto-generated.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of sales channel creation

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of sales channel updation

__v.description: Version key for tracking revisions. Default value is zero.

app_type.description: It shows whether application is live or in development mode
